item.title: Kiwis reflect: 84 incredible life lessons from the level 4 lockdown

item.description:

item.title: 'Goodbye, Mum. I love you': Son's diary of mother's last days with Covid-19
item.description: There are 18 Kiwis who have died of coronavirus in New Zealand. Each one leaves behind a grieving family and heartbroken friends. Here, in a moving diary, a son recalls his mother's last days of hope ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/GettyImages-6402-000214_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption="I can't remember if I told Mum I loved her before I left her for the last time. I love you Mum." Photo / Getty Images

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/93253336_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption="At dinner I have to tell my children their Nana is worse today than she was yesterday." Photo / 123RF

item.title: Truck driver charged after horror Melbourne crash killed four police officers
